name: Arlo Technologies, Inc.
description: Arlo Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of smart home security solutions, specializing in wireless security cameras and smart home products. Founded in 2014, Arlo emerged from Netgear as a dedicated brand focused on delivering innovative security solutions that empower users to monitor their homes and protect their families. The company’s product line includes an array of high-definition security cameras, video doorbells, and smart home accessories that leverage advanced technology such as artificial intelligence and cloud storage. Arlo's commitment to seamless user experiences is evident in its easy-to-use app that allows users to access real-time video feeds, receive alerts, and communicate through two-way audio. The company has established a reputation for reliability and innovation, constantly evolving its product offerings to meet the growing demand for smart home security. With a mission to provide peace of mind through technology, Arlo continues to set industry standards for quality and performance, making home security accessible and effective for everyone.
